General.Name: CubicFarm Systems Corp
General.Description: CubicFarm Systems Corp., a local chain agricultural technology company, develops and sells food and livestock feed technologies for farmers worldwide. The company offers CubicFarm System and HydroGreen Grow System. Its systems help farmers to produce lettuce, basil, microgreens, nutraceutical ingredients, and animal feed. The company was formerly known as Forty Foot Farms Ltd. and changed its name to CubicFarms Systems Corp. in June 2016. CubicFarms Systems Corp was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Langley, Canada.
General.Address: 7170 Glover Road, Langley, BC, Canada, V2Y 2R1
